name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMP Accelerated Mobile Pages Desktop Viewer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to view AMP (accelerated mobile pages) in the desktop browser. Allows you to enable AMP for individual websitesâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to view AMP (accelerated mobile pages) in the desktop browser. Allows you to enable AMP for individual websites or all websites.

When a page allows AMP view you will see an icon in the address bar, just click it. To return back to the normal version click it again.
